notes.title: JavaScript Advanced Concepts Study
notes.content:
ğŸ“š Study Session: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
ğŸ“… Date: July 18, 2024

ğŸ¯ Topics Covered:

1ï¸âƒ£ **Closures & Scope**
â€¢ Lexical scoping rules
â€¢ Function factories
â€¢ Memory considerations
â€¢ Practical applications

2ï¸âƒ£ **Async Programming**
â€¢ Promises vs async/await
â€¢ Error handling in async code
â€¢ Promise.all() and Promise.race()
â€¢ Callback hell solutions

3ï¸âƒ£ **ES6+ Features**
â€¢ Destructuring assignment
â€¢ Template literals
â€¢ Arrow functions scope
â€¢ Spread/rest operators
â€¢ Module imports/exports

4ï¸âƒ£ **DOM Manipulation**
â€¢ Event delegation
â€¢ Virtual DOM concepts
â€¢ Performance optimization
â€¢ Modern DOM APIs

ğŸ“ Practice Projects:
â€¢ Build a todo app with local storage
â€¢ Create async data fetching utility
â€¢ Implement custom event emitter

ğŸ“– Next Study Topics:
â€¢ Web Workers
â€¢ Service Workers
â€¢ WebAssembly basics
â€¢ Performance profiling

notes.title: Home Workout Routine
notes.content:
ğŸ’ª Daily Home Workout Plan
â° Duration: 45 minutes
ğŸ“… Schedule: Monday, Wednesday, Friday

ğŸ”¥ **Warm-up (10 minutes):**
â€¢ 5 minutes light jogging in place
â€¢ Arm circles (30 seconds each direction)
â€¢ Leg swings (30 seconds each leg)
â€¢ Dynamic stretches

ğŸ’ª **Strength Training (25 minutes):**

ğŸ‹ï¸ **Upper Body (12 minutes):**
â€¢ Push-ups: 3 sets x 12 reps
â€¢ Pike push-ups: 3 sets x 8 reps
â€¢ Tricep dips: 3 sets x 10 reps
â€¢ Plank: 3 sets x 45 seconds

ğŸ¦µ **Lower Body (13 minutes):**
â€¢ Squats: 3 sets x 15 reps
â€¢ Lunges: 3 sets x 12 reps (each leg)
â€¢ Single-leg glute bridges: 3 sets x 10 reps
â€¢ Wall sit: 3 sets x 30 seconds
â€¢ Calf raises: 3 sets x 20 reps

ğŸ§˜ **Cool Down (10 minutes):**
â€¢ Static stretching routine
â€¢ Deep breathing exercises
â€¢ Foam rolling (if available)

ğŸ“Š **Progress Tracking:**
